OOC:  True the Dinobots are formidable but Tucson isn't exactly helpless ei=
ther.  He may not be able to hold up in a tough battle with the Dinobots bu=
t he is still able to scoot out of the way when it depends on his life.  He=
 doesn't intend to attack, he's just defending himself.  And yeah, there is=
 an earthquake going on but agility was something he studied and worked har=
d on, so perhaps he may stumble a slight but he does know how to right hims=
elf by practicing balance.  A big focus in Kung Fu and Ninjutsu .  

The cr=
ouching maneuver was something I learned from watching a lot of Kung Fu mov=
ies.  First, potential energy is stored in the muscles and then the result =
is the release of that energy, making it Kinetic energy, and that's what Tu=
cson was doing.  Not quite on his knees, but on his feet.  And from there, =
he's able to launch his body straight up, releasing the Kinetic energy stor=
ed in his body.   I hope this makes it easier to understand.  Sorry for the=
 complexity of my last post.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. =
